question.title: Friend Requests I: Overall Acceptance Rate
hints: Still remember how to count the number of rows in a table?
What is the keyword to filter the duplicated records in a table?
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists friend_request  (        sender_id INT NOT NULL,        send_to_id INT NULL,        request_date DATE NULL)
Create table If Not Exists request_accepted (        requester_id INT NOT NULL,        accepter_id INT NULL,        accept_date DATE NULL)
